tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE similarity_scores (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    word1_id INT,
    word2_id INT,
    score FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (word1_id) REFERENCES word_embeddings(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (word2_id) REFERENCES word_embeddings(id)
);

CREATE TABLE phrase_similarity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    phrase1_id INT,
    phrase2_id INT,
    score FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (phrase1_id) REFERENCES phrases(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (phrase2_id) REFERENCES phrases(id)
);
